text:
#VergeetOnsNietHugo 
Dear @markrutte @hugodejonge - Please stop ignoring people with #chronicillness & prioritise us for the #COVID19 #vaccine. Shielding is delaying our treatments, ruining our physical & #mentalhealth. #coronavirus can kill us or worse, give us #LongCovid. https://t.co/rGbFZ2mfZw
